Articles.Content:
I just started out two days ago, and i need a bit of help. How do I make a challenge badge?

I know I need a third party software to make it but how do i upload it to my challenge?

Thank you for the help!

Hi RonnieThePotato, and welcome to our forum.  

Badges are merely images which people include in their forum signatures. Make your badge in any software, then upload it to an image hosting site so that people can copy it into their sigs and posts.
Welcome to the forums and a great game! What challenge are you looking to make a badge for?
I got it figured out, thanks for the help!
